description: octagonal rifle barrel with simple decoration at the breech; wheel pierced by four hearts; trigger guard forged with three loops at cusps of finger grooves; bone and mother-of-pearl inlay throughout, cheek inlaid with a standing south American Indian. Arms and Armor-Firearm
markings: at breech proper left side: [MP (over an inverted crescent)]
medium: Iron, fruitwood, bone, mother-of-pearl, and cowhorn
title: Wheel lock rifle
